verbs.description: as [ARG0: bay area jewish groups] [V: mourn] [ARG1: pittsburgh shooting victims safe spaces and security] come to mind worshipers filing into bay area synagogues are being met this week by security guards and metal detectors in the wake of the horrific attack by a gunman in pittsburgh on a jewish congregation that left 11 people dead jewish groups say they are beefing up security outside the doors of congregations and cultural meetings particularly in places where vigils will be held for the pittsburgh victims the actions come in response to saturday attack when a gunman walked into the tree of life synagogue in pittsburgh squirrel hill neighborhood and shot 17 people fatally wounding 11 robert bowers oliver benn san francisco state university bay area jewish squirrel hill david goldman san francisco los angeles county university police department temple emanu - el san francisco bay area jewish community center san francisco hillel gwendolyn wu tree of life synagogue anti - defamation league congregation b’nai shalom ucsf jewish community federation san jose state university richard cohen murder reporter pittsburgh east bay endowment fund spencer brodie director assault executive director santa barbara independent president asian american journalists association security walnut creek pittsburgh tree of life synagogue mission bay campus chronicle bay area granada hills northern california regional intelligence center sen dianne feinstein university of california southern poverty law center los angeles toland hall kerry philp santa barbara san fernando valley
